author: travelandtourworld.com
title: SFO Joins The Arc San Francisco and JetBlue to Host On-Plane Practice and Educational Event for Individuals with Autism and Developmental DisabilitiesTravelandtourworld.com
text:
SFO Joins The Arc San Francisco and JetBlue to Host On-Plane Practice and Educational Event for Individuals with Autism and Developmental Disabilities
The San Francisco International Airport (SFO) is partnering with The Arc San Francisco and JetBlue Airways to host an educational event for individuals with autism and developmental disabilities and their families. Titled “Ready Set Fly”, the program provides specialized support and guidance to families as they participate in an air travel practice that includes ticketing, security and boarding a JetBlue A-321 aircraft assigned especially for the event. Before boarding, participants will learn specialists’ tips for travelling with disabilities.
Media are invited to cover the event, which will include interview opportunities with select participants.
Source:- San Francisco International Airport
